mapper.select: SELECT parsing_key, service_url, Service_key, url_parameter, date_parameter, table_name, insert_query, comment, last_to_today, activity FROM parse_option
SELECT parsing_key, service_url, Service_key, url_parameter, date_parameter, table_name, insert_query, comment, last_to_today, activity FROM parse_option WHERE parsing_key = #{parsing_key}
